value.string:
software_instance = state_change['object']
 instance_setup_sale_packing_list_line = \
 context.SoftwareInstance_getInstancePackingListLine(
 state_change, 
 service_relative_url=software_instance.portal_preferences.\
 getPreferredInstanceSetupResource())
 instance_setup_sale_packing_list = instance_setup_sale_packing_list_line.getParentValue()
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 sale_packing_list_module = portal.getDefaultModule(portal_type='Sale Packing List')
 sale_packing_list = sale_packing_list_module.newContent(
 portal_type='Sale Packing List',
 specialise=instance_setup_sale_packing_list.getCausalityValue().getSpecialise(),
 destination=instance_setup_sale_packing_list.getDestination(),
 destination_section=instance_setup_sale_packing_list.getDestinationSection(),
 destination_decision_=instance_setup_sale_packing_list.getDestinationDecision(),
 source=instance_setup_sale_packing_list.getSource(),
 source_section=instance_setup_sale_packing_list.getSourceSection(),
 price_currency=instance_setup_sale_packing_list.getPriceCurrency(),
 start_date=DateTime())
 
 instance_hosting_sale_packing_list_line = sale_packing_list.newContent(
 portal_type='Sale Packing List Line',
 resource=service_relative_url,
 quantity=instance_setup_sale_packing_list_line.getQuantity(),
 aggregate_list=instance_setup_sale_packing_list_line.getAggregateList(),
 )
 return sale_packing_list
